Aboutme.name: Fabian Aps
Aboutme.title: IT Professional/DJ/Producer with Passion
Aboutme.description:
I am a {age} year old IT Professional/DJ/Producer and I
love developing software, but my internship at KfW
Banking Group showed me that application support also
comes naturally to me. Nevertheless, I still enjoy
development as a hobby. Music is also a passion of mine,
whether it's listening or producing.

liveWallpaper.title: Native/Wasm Live Wallpaper
liveWallpaper.description: A cross-platform live wallpaper with interactive particles in Nord design. The native C++23 implementation offers high performance, custom shaders, and runs directly in the browser thanks to WebAssembly.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: This website uses cookies to enhance your experience. Below you will find information about the cookies used on this site.

technical.title: Technical Cookies
technical.description: We only use technically necessary cookies that are essential for the website to function properly. These include cookies for storing your language preference and cookie consent status. These cookies cannot be disabled.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Content
thirdParty.description: Some pages contain embedded content from third-party services. These services may set their own cookies, which are outside of my control:

Contact.description: Let's connect! Book a meeting or send me a message.
Contact.calDescription: Schedule a call or meeting via Cal.com

CookieConsent.title: Cookie Notice
CookieConsent.description: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience. We only use technically necessary cookies that are essential for the website to function properly.

technicalCookies.title: Technical Cookies
technicalCookies.description: These cookies are required for basic site functionality, such as remembering your preferences and language settings. They cannot be disabled.

thirdPartyCookies.title: Third-Party Content
thirdPartyCookies.description: Some pages contain embedded content (iframes) from third-party services like Cal.com or Apple Music. These services may set their own cookies, which are outside of my control. By using this site, you acknowledge this.
